channel.title: [HELP] spawn protection + multiverse [HELP]
channel.description:
Alright, so im having a slight problem.
Basically, spawn is only being protected on world1. In world2 and world3, spawn can be dug up but cannot be placed (half way working). Has anyone had this problem, and is there a way to fix? I have tried using the residence plugin but it gives me an error stating something on the lines that "Essentials api is being called before essentials is loaded" or something like that.
If i cant get spawn to protect the spawn on world2 and world3, is there any other plugin you would suggest adding for zone protections? I tried Epiczone and i didnt like it too much :S
Plugins i am currently using: Essentials.jar EssentialsChat.jar Multiverse-core.jar Multiverse-portal.jar

item.title: [HELP] spawn protection + multiverse [HELP]

item.description:
@moparisthebest wrote:

As you know, I had this same problem on world 2, I ended up just protecting it with residence.
